title: Champion's cape

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Champion's cape is a cosmetic cape that is obtained by speaking to Larxus after defeating all 11 champions available in the Champions' Challenge. It is worn by Leon d'Cour, the human champion, Dimintheis, a Varrockian noble, as well as Toby, the taskmaster of the Varrock Diary.

The Champion's cape is a cosmetic cape that is obtained by speaking to Larxus after defeating all 11 champions available in the Champions' Challenge. It is worn by Leon d'Cour, the human champion, Dimintheis, a Varrockian noble, as well as Toby, the taskmaster of the Varrock Diary.

It can be mounted on a cape hanger in an Achievement Gallery of a player-owned house.

This item can be stored in the cape rack of a costume room.

+0+0+0%+0List

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The cape depicts three heraldic lions, similar to those found on the Royal Arms of England.
  • As of 3 October 2019, 1,093 players are eligible to claim the cape.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Lottie's Twitter account. 3 October 2019. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Lottie: "1,093 players have completed all 11 Champion's Challenges in @OldSchoolRS and are able to wear the Champion's cape. #RuneStats"

[[File:Champion's cape detail.png|left|90px]]
The '''Champion's cape''' is a cosmetic [[cape]] that is obtained by speaking to [[Larxus]] after defeating all 11 champions available in the [[Champions' Challenge]]. It is worn by [[Leon d'Cour]], the human champion, [[Dimintheis]], a [[Varrock]]ian noble, as well as [[Toby]], the taskmaster of the [[Varrock Diary]].

It can be mounted on a [[cape hanger]] in an [[Achievement Gallery]] of a [[player-owned house]].

{{Costume storage|cape rack}}

==Trivia==
*The cape depicts three heraldic lions, similar to those found on the {{wp|Royal Arms of England}}.
*As of [[3 October]] [[2019]], 1,093 players are eligible to claim the cape.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Lottie|url=https://twitter.com/JagexLottie/status/1179736483453952000|date=3 October 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/TvpiY|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=1,093 players have completed all 11 Champion's Challenges in @OldSchoolRS and are able to wear the Champion's cape. #RuneStats}}
